function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased virtual and augmented reality use may lead to prolonged screen time and potential health issues.","Impact":"Potential health issues due to prolonged screen time.","Mitigation":"Provide guidelines for healthy screen time, encourage breaks, and promote ergonomic setups for virtual work.","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, activity tracking technology, and screen time monitoring software.","People":"Employees and individuals working in virtual environments.","Owner":"Employers, healthcare professionals, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Unclear long-term impact of increased remote working on mental health and social connections.","Impact":"Potential negative impact on mental health and social connections.","Mitigation":"Research and monitor the long-term impact, provide mental health support, and encourage social interaction and community building.","Technologies":"Mental health monitoring technology, virtual community platforms, and social connection apps.","People":"Remote workers, employers, and communities.","Owner":"Research institutions, mental health professionals, and employers."},{"Description":"Implementation of touchless technologies may create a false sense of security and lead to neglect of other hygiene practices.","Impact":"Neglect of other hygiene practices, leading to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Educate on the importance of holistic hygiene, provide training on hygiene best practices, and promote a multi-layered approach to disease prevention.","Technologies":"Hygiene training modules, public health education apps, and smart hygiene monitoring devices.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Facility management teams, public health agencies, and educational institutions."}]}
